title: Forces - coefficient of friction on ramp

content.description: A block is given an initial speed of <math alttext="20 meters per second" overflow="scroll"><mn>20</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></math> up a rough ramp that makes an angle of <math alttext="30 degrees" overflow="scroll"><mn>30</mn><mo>Â°</mo></math> with the horizontal, as shown. After sliding up the ramp for <math alttext="2.0 seconds" overflow="scroll"> <mn>2.0</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi> </math> the block momentarily comes to rest near the top of the ramp.
content.question: What is the approximate coefficient of kinetic friction between the block and the ramp?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
